description.main_description: All out Pro.\r\niPhone 17 Pro. The most powerful iPhone ever. Brilliant 6.3-inch display1, aluminium unibody design, A19 Pro chip, all 48MP rear cameras and breakthrough battery life.
key_features: UNIBODY DESIGN. FOR EXCEPTIONAL POWER. - Heat-forged aluminium unibody design for the most powerful iPhone ever made.

DURABLE CERAMIC SHIELD. FRONT AND BACK. - Ceramic Shield protects the back of iPhone 17 Pro, making it 4x more resistant to cracks.2 And the new Ceramic Shield 2 on the front has 3x better scratch resistance.3
THE ULTIMATE PRO CAMERA SYSTEM - With all 48MP rear cameras and 8x optical-quality zoom - the widest zoom range ever in an iPhone. It’s the equivalent of eight pro lenses in your pocket.
18MP CENTER STAGE FRONT CAMERA - Flexible ways to frame your shot. Smarter group selfies, Dual Capture video for simultaneous front and rear recording, and more.
A19 PRO CHIP. VAPOUR-COOLED. LIGHTNING-FAST. - A19 Pro is the most powerful iPhone chip yet, delivering up to 40 per cent better sustained performance.
BREAKTHROUGH BATTERY LIFE - The unibody design creates massive additional battery capacity, for up to 31 hours of video playback.4 Charge up to 50 per cent in 20 minutes.5

IOS 26. NEW LOOK. EVEN MORE MAGIC. - A fresh design with Liquid Glass. Beautiful, delightful and instantly familiar. With a more vibrant Lock Screen, customisable backgrounds and polls in Messages, Call Screening and more.6
BUILT FOR APPLE INTELLIGENCE - Personal, private, powerful. Write, express yourself and get things done effortlessly.7

VITAL SAFETY FEATURES - If you don’t have mobile reception or Wi-Fi, iPhone can connect to a satellite so you can contact emergency services.8 And in a severe car crash, iPhone can call for help if you can’t.9
STRONGER CONNECTIVITY. SUPERFAST SPEEDS. - Stay connected at faster speeds with secure connections to Wi-Fi 710, 5G networks11 and Bluetooth® 6, plus eSIM. 12
ESIM, FLEXIBLE. SECURE. SEAMLESS. - With eSIM, you enjoy greater flexibility, enhanced convenience, increased security and seamless connectivity, especially when travelling internationally.12
PRIVACY - A whole new level of privacy and security. Built in.

description.main_description: Everything you love. Including the priceiPhone 16e is built for Apple Intelligence and powered by the A18 chip.1Shoot super-high-resolution photos with the 48MP Fusion camera. And with supersized battery life, you have more time to text, browse and more.
key_features: BUILT FOR APPLE INTELLIGENCE - Personal, private, powerful. Write, express yourself and get things done effortlessly1
A18 CHIP. FAST INTO THE FUTURE - A18 chip powers Apple Intelligence, gaming, and regular iOS updates to keep your iPhone feeling new for years to come.
SUPERSIZED BATTERY LIFE  - Text, browse, and binge movies and shows, with up to 26 hours of video playback2 — the best battery life in a 6.1-inch iPhone.3
CAMERAS - The two-in-one camera system has a 48MP Fusion camera for super-high-resolution photos and an optical-quality 2x Telephoto. Take incredible selfies with the 12MP front camera.
DURABLE DESIGN. BRILLIANT DISPLAY - Stunning 6.1-inch display uses OLED technology. Ceramic Shield front — tougher than any smartphone glass.
ACTION BUTTON  - Quick customisable access to your favourite apps and features, or use visual intelligence to learn about your surroundings.
MAKE IT YOURS - With iOS 18, you can customise your Home Screen and Lock Screen, send messages with text effects, Tapback with any emoji and more.

VISUAL SAFETY FEATURES - If you need emergency services and you don’t have mobile service or Wi-Fi, you can use Emergency SOS via satellite.4 With Crash Detection, iPhone can detect a severe car crash and call for help if you can’t.5
PRIVACY - Use Face ID to securely unlock, sign in and pay.

description.main_description: Escape the ordinary with Google Pixel 10. It has Pixel’s most powerful chip, an incredible camera, and Gemini built in to help supercharge your productivity and creativity.1
key_features: The power behind AI on Google Pixel. - \r\nGoogle Tensor G5 is Pixel’s most powerful chip yet. It makes Pixel 10 phones even faster, bringing you Google’s most advanced AI, Pixel’s cutting-edge photo and video quality and an all-day battery life.2, 3, 4\r\n

On a serious power chip. - \r\nThe all-new Google Tensor G5 chip is Pixel’s biggest performance leap yet. It’s custom built for Google’s advanced AI, an all-day battery life, high-quality photos and videos and up to 60% more computing power than the Pixel 9.2, 3\r\n

Powerhouse performance. - \r\nPixel 10 runs fast and smooth with 12 GB of RAM. And it’s designed to handle Google’s advanced AI, giving you innovative photo and video editing and powerful Gemini features.1\r\n

Easy on the eyes, even in direct sunlight - \r\nPixel 10’s 6.3-inch Actua display with up to 3,000-nit peak brightness is sharp and vibrant, with better readability outdoors.5And it has a refresh rate up to 120Hz for super smooth scrolling and switching between apps.\r\n

A battery that lasts. And is capable of charging fast. - \r\nPixel 10 has an all-day battery that can last over 24 hours and up to 100 hours with Extreme Battery Saver.3Plus, with Pixelsnap magnetic technology it is compatible with Qi-2 certified wireless chargers that snap into place.6\r\n

Charge wirelessly in a snap. - \r\nPixel 10 phones have Pixelsnap magnetic technology compatible with Qi-2 certified wireless chargers for effortless wireless charging that snap into place for efficient charging.6You’ll also have a world of magnetic accessories to choose from – stands, grips, wallets and more.7\r\n

True-to-life images. Out-of-this-world editing. - \r\nPixel 10 has an upgraded advanced triple camera system, with a new 5x telephoto lens and Super Res Zoom up to 20x. So it’s easy to capture stunning photos and videos in almost any light, and make complex edits with a few taps.\r\n

Transform photos in the blink of AI. - \r\nIt’s easy to work your editing magic with Pixel. Make complex edits, like removing distractions, moving objects and merging photos into one where everyone looks their best.8\r\n

description.main_description: Meet the new status pro. Pixel 10 Pro features advanced AI with Gemini, unbelievable camera quality, impeccable design and the next-gen Google Tensor G5 chip.1
key_features: The power behind AI on Google Pixel. - \r\nGoogle Tensor G5 is Pixel’s most powerful chip yet. It makes Pixel 10 phones even faster, bringing you Google’s most advanced AI, Pixel’s cutting-edge photo and video quality and an all-day battery life.2, 3, 4\r\n

Next-gen chip. Advanced AI performance. - \r\nThe new Google Tensor G5 chip is Pixel’s biggest leap in performance yet. It’s custom built with a TPU that’s up to 60% more powerful and a CPU that’s up to 25% faster than the Pixel 9 Pro, to optimise Google’s most advanced AI.5It also delivers Pixel’s highest-quality photos and videos with an upgraded ISP, and drives Pixel 10 Pro’s all-day battery life.3\r\n

16 GB of RAM for pro-level performance. - \r\nDo more at once with Pixel 10 Pro. The Pixel 10 Pro series delivers Pixel’s smoothest, fastest experiences in your most demanding apps and with Gemini Nano, Google’s most advanced AI model on a mobile device.\r\n

The brightest display ever on a Pixel. - \r\nThe vibrant Super Actua display features up to 3,300-nit peak brightness for an immersive screen, even in direct sunlight.6And it has a refresh rate up to 120 Hz for super smooth scrolling and switching between apps.\r\n

Can last up to 24+ hours and capable of charging in a snap. - \r\nPixel 10 Pro can last over 24 hours and up to 100 hours with Extreme Battery Saver.3It is capable of charging to 55% in about 30 minutes and with Pixelsnap magnetic technology it is compatible with Qi-2 certified wireless chargers that snap into place.7\r\n

Charge wirelessly in a snap. - \r\nPixel 10 phones have Pixelsnap magnetic technology compatible with Qi-2 certified wireless chargers for effortless wireless charging that snap into place for efficient charging.7You’ll also have a world of magnetic accessories to choose from – stands, grips, wallets and more.8\r\n

Studio-quality photos. Pro-level videos. - \r\nPixel’s pro camera system makes everything look amazing by default, even in low light. Capture more of the scene with advanced AI models and bring out incredible details with up to 100x zoom, stunning 50 MP images, and super steady videos in 8K with Video Boost.9\r\n

Transform photos in the blink of AI. - \r\nIt’s easy to work your editing magic with Pixel. Make complex edits, like removing distractions, moving objects and merging photos into one where everyone looks their best.10\r\n

description.main_description: Unfold extraordinary with Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold. Pixel’s largest screen, plus Google’s most advanced AI with Gemini.1It’s the best Pixel for multitasking and entertainment.
key_features: The power behind AI on Google Pixel. - \r\nGoogle Tensor G5 is Pixel’s most powerful chip yet. It makes Pixel 10 phones even faster, bringing you Google’s most advanced AI, Pixel’s cutting-edge photo and video quality and an all-day battery life.2, 3, 4\r\n

Pixel’s biggest chip upgrade yet. - \r\nThe all-new Google Tensor G5 chip is made for powerful multitasking. It has a TPU that’s up to 60% more powerful and a CPU that’s up to 25% faster than the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, to help you to take photos more quickly, browse web pages more smoothly and get Google’s most advanced AI.5All with an all-day battery life.3\r\n

16 GB of RAM for pro-level performance. - \r\nDo more at once with Pixel 10 Pro Fold. The Pixel 10 Pro series delivers our smoothest, fastest experiences in your most demanding apps and with Gemini Nano – Google’s most advanced AI model on a mobile device.\r\n

Big and bright. Inside and out. - \r\nInside, you get a massive 8-inch Super Actua Flex display, ready to help you dive into immersive entertainment or find your flow with masterful multitasking.5Outside, there’s an 11% brighter 6.4-inch Actua display that looks and feels great in your hand.6,5\r\n

Can last up to 24+ hours. One charge. - \r\nPixel 10 Pro Fold can last over 24 hours and up to 84 hours with Extreme Battery Saver.3It charges up fast. As in, up to 50% in just 30 minutes fast.7And it’s Google’s first foldable with Pixelsnap magnetic technology compatible with Qi-2 certified wireless chargers that snap into place.8\r\n

Charge wirelessly in a snap. - \r\nPixel 10 phones have Pixelsnap magnetic technology compatible with Qi-2 certified wireless chargers for effortless wireless charging that snap into place for efficient charging.8You’ll also have a world of magnetic accessories to choose from – stands, grips, wallets and more.9\r\n

The amazing Pixel Camera is folded in. - \r\nWith a versatile design and advanced AI, you can do things during photo ops that only a Pixel Fold camera system lets you do – review and preview photos in real time, take incredible group pics and get stunning, sharp closeups with a 5x telephoto lens and Super Res Zoom up to 20x.\r\n

Transform photos in the blink of AI. - \r\nIt’s easy to work your editing magic with Pixel. Make complex edits, like removing distractions, moving objects and merging photos into one where everyone looks their best.10\r\n

description.main_description: Introducing the new Samsung Galaxy S25+, the smartphone built to make your everyday better.
key_features: Galaxy AI - Enjoy getting more things done, the simpler way with Galaxy AI1on the Galaxy S25+. Find a great pet-friendly restaurant nearby and message your friend to arrange a meeting time in a single step. Just ask in the natural way you would ask a person and it will process your request, performing complex tasks across multiple apps. Be ready for the day ahead from the moment you wake up, with Now Brief. Delivering your personalised insights, from weather, news, health stats, to calendar reminders and more. It’s your ultimate personal assistant.

Camera - Take your best shots yet, day or night, on the Galaxy S25+. Featuring an added range of up to 5x digital zoom in Portrait Mode and epic 50MP lens, the upgraded Nightography mode features 2-steps of noise reduction so you can shoot photos and video as clear as day, even when the sun goes down. Plus, the Galaxy S25+ is now powered by an object-aware advanced AI engine1, reducing light distortion to show your skin’s best natural glow.

Security \u0026amp; Privacy - Stay in control of your privacy on the Galaxy S25+. You have the freedom of personalising your security settings and opting in-or-out of Galaxy AI features1, for some added peace of mind. Knox Vault encryption ensures Galaxy AI on-device personalised data is secure and protected, so no other apps can access it.

Design - Step up your style with the simply striking design of the Galaxy S25+. Robustly designed, it features an IP683rating for water and dust resistance and strong Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 22. Streamlined with classic curved edges for your comfort, it comes in a range of stylish new colours, made for epic self-expression.

Performance - Enjoy performance that powers good times. The Galaxy S25+ features an enhanced4built-in vapour chamber and the latest chipset, customised for Galaxy. It gives you faster speeds and extra power efficiency4for seamless gaming and epic entertainment on-the-go, all powered by a self-optimising and long lasting battery that you can rely on.

Display - Gaming never looked so good on the Galaxy S25+. Immerse yourself in other worlds with a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and AI-powered scaler1, giving you better image quality and advanced ray tracing for unbelievable graphic detail.

It’s custom built with a TPU that’s up to 60% more powerful and a CPU that’s up to 25% faster than the Pixel 9 Pro, to optimise Google’s most advanced AI.5It also delivers Pixel’s highest-quality photos and videos with an upgraded ISP, and drives Pixel 10 Pro’s all-day battery life.3\n

16 GB of RAM for pro-level performance. - \nDo more at once with Pixel 10 Pro. The Pixel 10 Pro series delivers Pixel’s smoothest, fastest experiences in your most demanding apps and with Gemini Nano, Google’s most advanced AI model on a mobile device.\n

The brightest display ever on a Pixel. - \nThe vibrant Super Actua display features up to 3,300-nit peak brightness for an immersive screen, even in direct sunlight.6And it has a refresh rate up to 120 Hz for super smooth scrolling and switching between apps.\n

Can last up to 24+ hours, ultrafast charging capable. - \nPixel 10 Pro can last over 24 hours and up to 100 hours with Extreme Battery Saver.3It is capable of charging to 55% in about 30 minutes and with Pixelsnap magnetic technology it is compatible with Qi-2 certified wireless chargers that snap into place.7\n

Charge wirelessly in a snap. - \nPixel 10 phones have Pixelsnap magnetic technology compatible with Qi-2 certified wireless chargers for effortless wireless charging that snap into place for efficient charging.7You’ll also have a world of magnetic accessories to choose from – stands, grips, wallets and more.8\n

Studio-quality photos. Pro-level videos. - \nPixel’s pro camera system makes everything look amazing by default, even in low light. Capture more of the scene with advanced AI models and bring out incredible details with up to 100x zoom, stunning 50 MP images, and super steady videos in 8K with Video Boost.9\n

Transform photos in the blink of AI. - \nIt’s easy to work your editing magic with Pixel. Make complex edits, like removing distractions, moving objects and merging photos into one where everyone looks their best.10\n

key_features:
Take the picture. And be in it, too. - 
 
Add Me makes sure no one is left out of a photo. Take one with the group, then swap in the photographer, and Pixel magically merges both photos.4

It’s built to last. -

One ask, done across your apps. -

The dependable all-day battery. - 
 
The Adaptive Battery on Pixel 9a can last over30hours. Need even more? Turn on Extreme Battery Saver to make it last up to 100.7That’s big energy.

Amazing photography made simple. - 
 
Take photos and videos so amazing, you won’t believe you actually took them. Capture small details, create perfect group shots and even get vivid ones at night.

Tiny is epic. - 
 
Use Macro Focus to reveal vivid colour and striking contrast in photos and videos of the smallest details – like raindrops, flowers or sprinkles.

Brilliant photos, dusk to dawn. - 
 
Night Sight takes sharp, vivid photos, portraits and panos in low light, like concerts and cityscapes – even the Milky Way with Astrophotography.

Group pics the whole group loves. -

The phone that keeps getting better. - 
 
Your new Pixel comes with OS and security updates for 7 years from launch, and new and upgraded features with Pixel Drops.8

Your AI creative canvas. - 
 
Make your own memes, stickers and whatever else you can dream up in seconds, from wherever you’re typing.9A surfing tiger, cartoon style? You got it.

Reimagine your photos, right on your phone. - 
 
Magic Editor in Google Photos makes complex edits easy. With a few taps, AI can change the background, move objects and more.10

Designed for your peace of mind. - 
 
Pixel is built with safety features that help you prepare and react in an emergency. It can quickly call emergency services and share accurate location info so they know where to send help.11

description.main_description: With an incredible camera, plentiful storage, and a sleek design, the HMD Skyline 12GB/256GB delivers a powerful performance that can handle your day-to-day demands in style.
key_features:
Your shots are about to take off - 

One for the creators; 50 MP AF selfies with eye-tracking, 108MP Hybrid OIS main camera, 50MP Telephoto for 4x zoom and 13MP UW for the perfect 0.5x selfies or landscapes. Throw in things like Selfie Gestures, Capture Fusion and 50mm portraits, you’ll be in creator mode in no time.

Just pop the hood and fix it yourself - 

Most of us know the feeling of dropping a phone and cracking the screen. With HMD Skyline, it’s not that big of a deal. Its Gen2 repairability basically means that you can just pop off the back cover and you’re in. Best of all, the phone looks like it comes from a catwalk with its stunning, and smart design.

Now with Detox Mode - 

We can’t turn off all the background noise in your life but we can help you hit pause and take a moment. Activate the Digital Detox Mode to disable the visibility of your social apps. Don’t worry, they’ll be there when you turn the mode off. Until then, enjoy some time in the real world. We’ve also added a touch more zen to the rest of your Android™. The Balance Interface, has a few things moved around to make finding them easier. It even sounds more chill with alarms, notification sounds and ringtones that won’t have you jumping out of your skin.

The Custom Button - 

Make your phone more “you” with the Custom Button. You can set it up so that it does one thing when you hold it, and another thing when you double-press it. It’s your shortcut to your favourite game, navigating home, asking the AI-powered assistant of your choice weird questions, and more.

Adaptive Power - 

With long-lasting battery, the Google Pixel 8a features Pixel's Adaptive Battery2, allowing it to last for over 24 hours and 72 hours on Extreme Battery Saver.

Fresh, Long-Lasting Design - 

Designed with a smooth finish with a matte back cover, a Corning® Gorilla® Glass, and an IP67 construction3, the Google Pixel 8a offers unmatched style and durability against scratches, spills, and accidental slips.

Google AI - 

Powered by Google AI, the Google Pixel 8a lets you capture perfect group shots and fix blurry images. With a built-in AI assistant, you can access Gemini4and Circle to search5directly from an app you're using.

Take the picture. And be in it, too. - 
 
Add Me makes sure no one is left out of a photo. Take one with the group, then swap in the photographer, and Pixel magically merges both photos.4

It’s built to last. - 
 
Pixel 9a is designed to handle spills, dust, drops and dings.1 From IP68 water and dust protection to a scratch-resistant display and long-lasting materials, it’s the most durable Pixel A-Series phone yet.5

One ask, done across your apps. - 
 
Save time by asking Gemini to find information and get things done for you across your Google apps – like Maps, Calendar, Gmail and YouTube Music. It’s multitasking made easy.6

The dependable all-day battery. - 
 
The Adaptive Battery on Pixel 9a can last over30hours. Need even more? Turn on Extreme Battery Saver to make it last up to 100.7That’s big energy.

Amazing photography made simple. - 
 
Take photos and videos so amazing, you won’t believe you actually took them. Capture small details, create perfect group shots and even get vivid ones at night.

Tiny is epic. - 
 
Use Macro Focus to reveal vivid colour and striking contrast in photos and videos of the smallest details – like raindrops, flowers or sprinkles.

Brilliant photos, dusk to dawn. - 
 
Night Sight takes sharp, vivid photos, portraits and panos in low light, like concerts and cityscapes – even the Milky Way with Astrophotography.

Group pics the whole group loves. - 
 
Get an amazing group photo by combining similar photos. Pixel finds the best moment, or you can choose everyone’s best expression.

The phone that keeps getting better. - 
 
Your new Pixel comes with OS and security updates for 7 years from launch, and new and upgraded features with Pixel Drops.8

Your AI creative canvas. - 
 
Make your own memes, stickers and whatever else you can dream up in seconds, from wherever you’re typing.9A surfing tiger, cartoon style? You got it.

Reimagine your photos, right on your phone. - 
 
Magic Editor in Google Photos makes complex edits easy. With a few taps, AI can change the background, move objects and more.10

description.main_description: Made with advanced features, including a powerful processor, stunning display, and a versatile camera system, the TCL 50 Pro NXTPAPER 5G 8GB/512GB offers reliable speed and performance. With plentiful storage and long-lasting battery life, you can get ample room for your media files and stay connected all day.
key_features:
Reliable Speed and Performance - 

Driven by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 and G57 MC2 GPU, the TCL 50 Pro NXTPAPER 5G 8GB/512GB ensures fast and smooth performance. It offers 5G connectivity to deliver lightning-fast internet speeds.

Stunning Visuals - 

With a TCL 50 Pro NXTPAPER 6.78-inch FHD+ NXTPAPER display, the TCL 50 Pro NXTPAPER lets you enjoy crisp, clear visuals with uncompromised eye comfort. It features a 1080 x 2460 resolution to produce vibrant colours and sharp detail.

Capture Stunning Photos - 

Fitted with a 108MP triple camera setup, including 8MP and 2MP lenses, plus a 32MP front camera, the TCL 50 Pro NXTPAPER allows you to capture high-quality selfies, and record videos in 1080p at 30fps.

Ample Storage and Long-lasting Battery - 

The TCL 50 Pro NXTPAPER 5G is equipped with a 512GB internal memory and a 5010mAh battery, giving you ample storage and long-lasting battery. Keeping your data secure, the TCL 50 Pro can be unlocked via fingerprint or face recognition.

specifications.Additional Features: 33W Fast Charging, Side Fingerprint Scanner, Face Unlock

description.main_description: Everything you love. Including the priceiPhone 16e is built for Apple Intelligence and powered by the A18 chip.1Shoot super-high-resolution photos with the 48MP Fusion camera. And with supersized battery life, you have more time to text, browse and more.
key_features: BUILT FOR APPLE INTELLIGENCE - Personal, private, powerful. Write, express yourself and get things done effortlessly1
A18 CHIP. FAST INTO THE FUTURE - A18 chip powers Apple Intelligence, gaming, and regular iOS updates to keep your iPhone feeling new for years to come.
SUPERSIZED BATTERY LIFE  - Text, browse, and binge movies and shows, with up to 26 hours of video playback2 — the best battery life in a 6.1-inch iPhone.3
CAMERAS - The two-in-one camera system has a 48MP Fusion camera for super-high-resolution photos and an optical-quality 2x Telephoto. Take incredible selfies with the 12MP front camera.
DURABLE DESIGN. BRILLIANT DISPLAY - Stunning 6.1-inch display uses OLED technology. Ceramic Shield front — tougher than any smartphone glass.
ACTION BUTTON  - Quick customisable access to your favourite apps and features, or use visual intelligence to learn about your surroundings.
MAKE IT YOURS - With iOS 18, you can customise your Home Screen and Lock Screen, send messages with text effects, Tapback with any emoji and more.

VISUAL SAFETY FEATURES - If you need emergency services and you don’t have mobile service or Wi-Fi, you can use Emergency SOS via satellite.4 With Crash Detection, iPhone can detect a severe car crash and call for help if you can’t.5
PRIVACY - Use Face ID to securely unlock, sign in and pay.

description.main_description: With its incredible camera, vibrant display, plentiful storage, and AI technology, the new Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra has the essentials covered in one stylish package.
key_features:
AI Technology - 

Thanks to AI, search your favourite content on Circle to Search with Google, and experience Live Translate, Note Assist, and PhotoAssist on your new Galaxy S24 Ultra.

Crystal Clear Captures - 

Featuring a 200MP camera with a 10x optical zoom, the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra allows you to easily capture various moments, including breathtaking landscapes and detailed close-ups with optimum clarity.

Immersive Display - 

The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra comes with a large and immersive 6.8-inch QHD Display to provide a smooth and seamless scrolling, gaming and multi-tasking experience. It also offers vibrant colours and enhanced outdoor visibility.

Powerful Performance - 

With a powerful processor and improved cooling system, the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra enables maximised processing speed, optimum gaming performance, and immediate image processing when using the camera.

Impressive Runtime - 

Integrated with a powerful and long-lasting 5000mAh battery, the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra smartphone makes it easy to freely connect, stream, and share for longer hours.

specifications.Additional Features: 45W Fast Charging, Facial Recognition, Fast Wireless Charging, Ultrasonic In-Screen Fingerprint, Water and Dust Resistance (IP68), Wireless PowerShare

description.main_description: With Google AI and the best Pixel camera yet, Google Pixel 8 Pro enhances your smartphone experience. It also comes with advanced security, an intuitive interface and a 6.7-inch display. All in a sleek and stylish design.
key_features:
Next-Level Performance - 

Equipped with the Google Tensor G3 chip, custom-designed with Google AI for cutting-edge photo and video features. And it makes Pixel super fast and efficient.

Pixel’s Best Camera Yet - 

Record smooth videos, capture low light photos, and use Magic Editor to add studio quality enhancements to any photo* - improve lighting and background, move a subject, and more, with just a few taps. Plus, get full resolution images with Pro controls**.

Secure and Helpful - 

Featuring VPN by Google One*** for extra protection when online and 7 years of OS, security and Feature Drop updates.**** Pixel 8 Pro can even help you get temperature readings directly on your phone. While, Google Assistant can help you avoid unwanted calls*****.

Adaptive Battery - 

Pixel’s Adaptive Battery can last over 24 hours, and up to 72 hours with Extreme Battery Saver mode turned on, for power when you need it most.******

description.main_description: With its incredible camera, vibrant display, and plentiful storage, OPPO A40 has the essentials covered in one stylish package.
key_features:
Military-Grade Shock Resistance - 

Embrace the rough and tumble of everyday life to the full, worry free. It has passed military-grade durability tests, including shock and drop resistance.

A-mazing, Battery! - 

This 5100mAh battery isn't just big. It's durable too, performing at a minimum of 80% capacity of a new one after more than four years of use.10 Now that's something to celebrate!

System-Level Smooth - 

Go with your flow as your phone keeps pace with your activity, whatever you're doing. OPPO's exclusive system-level Trinity Engine keeps things smooth and stable, even under pressure.

Supercharge Your Shots - 

The 50MP Ultra-Clear Camera has a 12.5MP default mode for ultra-clear shots with excellent photosensitivity and makes the most of your storage space. Need higher resolution pics? Just switch it up to 50MP.

description.main_description: Powered by moto ai, the motorola razr 50 ultra 5G offers new and creative ways of snapping photos and accessing amazing apps. With the Flex View, you can enjoy your own photo booth and experience a smooth and vivid poLED display.
key_features:
See More - 

With a large and intelligent external display1, the motorola razr 50 ultra 5G lets you access apps and moto ai-powered functions even without flipping open the phone.

Stylish and Comfortable - 

Compact and comfortable, the motorola razr 50 ultra features an iconic flip design. It comes in different colours and is crafted in soft vegan leather, making it a stylish choice for refined individuals.

Powered by moto ai - 

With Flex View, you can use the motorola razr 50 ultra like a camcorder and capture hands-free selfies. Thanks to the moto ai-powered camera system with a 50MP camera and 2x telephoto lens, you can effortlessly snap photos and videos.

Optimised Power and Performance - 

Equipped with a Snapdragon&reg; 8s Gen 3 with powerful AI engine processing, the motorola razr 50 ultra delivers optimum speed and efficiency. Powered by a 4000mAh battery, you get all-day power in up to 12 minutes using 45W TurboPowerTM charging2.

description.main_description: Featuring a screen with a fast refresh rate, an AI-powered camera, and powerful performance, the Motorola g04 4G 64GB lets you capture amazing, ultra-clear snaps while keeping you connected.
key_features:
Sleek Charm - 

Specially crafted from premium materials, the Motorola g04 4G 64GB showcases a sleek design with a slim profile and comes in various colours to suit your personal style.

Fast Refresh Rate and Clear Display - 

Boasting a *90Hz refresh rate and a high brightness mode, the Motorola g04 4G, offers a smooth display and a clear screen even when you're under the sun. It also features **Dolby Atmos&reg; to elevate your entertainment experience.

AI-Powered - 

Supported by AI, the Motorola g04 4G's 16MP camera can help optimise your photos as you capture them, making them social media-ready.

description.main_description: Featuring essential features and a compact design, the RUIO F286 4G Mobile Phone is specially designed to deliver reliable performance and convenience.
key_features:
Efficient Performance - 

Powered by the UNISOC T107 CPU, the RUIO F286 4G Mobile Phone delivers smooth and efficient performance for your daily tasks.

Clear Display - 

Equipped with a 2.4-inch QVGA TFT display, the RUIO F286 Mobile Phone offers clear visuals. It comes in a compact construction, making it portable.

Essential Features - 

For added functionality, the RUIO F286 Mobile Phone is made with VoLTE support, FM Radio, Bluetooth, MP3 player, games, and GPS.

Long-Lasting Battery - 

Powered by a 1500mAh battery, the RUIO F286 Mobile Phone keeps you connected throughout the day.

specifications.Additional Features: FM Radio

description.main_description: With plentiful amazing features and a sleek design, the TCL 503 64GB is a bonafide pocket-sized powerhouse.
key_features:
Immersive Vision - 

Get your tasks done and enjoy watching what you like with HD+ sharp clarity on the 6.6“ V-notch display. In addition, it has 720 x 1612 resolution, giving its display popping colors, sharp clarity, and stark contrast.

Stable and Smooth - 

The dedicated memory power reserve of up to 3GB RAM will give you an extra boost to support busier multitasking and online performance with less lagging and latency.

Ample Storage - 

Store up to 10,000 photos or 10,000 music tracks, thanks to the TCL 503’s large 64GB storage. It also has an expandable storage of up to 512GB.

Long-lasting Performance - 

Get the most out of your day with a battery you can count on. The TCL 503 comes with an Octa-core processor and more powerful 5000mAh battery, so you’ll always have power when you need it most.

specifications.Additional Features: Rear Fingerprint Scanner, Face Unlock

description.main_description: Engineered with versatility and innovation, the HMD Fusion 8GB/256GB offers multiple customisable features and an ultra-slim design, making it a functional tool for your modern lifestyle.
key_features:
Customised Functions - 

Access multiple functionalities, including wireless charging and rugged protection using the HMD Fusion 8GB/256GB's Fusion Outfits. With the included open-source toolkit, you can experience endless possibilities for new Smart Outfits.

Easy Screen Replacement - 
 
Making screen maintenance a breeze, the HMD Fusion offers easy screen replacement by letting you simply pop it open, switch out the screen, and put it back together.

Sleek and Elegant - 
 
Showcasing an ultra-slim, see-through body, the HMD Fusion offers a sophisticated appeal enhanced with a sleek profile.

Capture Stunning Photos - 

The HMD Fusion is equipped with a 50MP selfie camera and 108MP rear camera and features various functions, such as Selfie Gestures, Selfie slo-mo, and low-light capabilities, so you can capture perfect shots every time.

specifications.Additional Features: 33W Fast Charging, Fingerprint Sensor

description.main_description: iPhone 16 Pro. Hello, Apple Intelligence.iPhone 16 Pro. Built for Apple Intelligence.1Featuring a stunning titanium design. Camera Control. 4K 120 fps Dolby Vision. And A18 Pro chip.
key_features: STUNNING TITANIUM DESIGN - iPhone 16 Pro has a strong and light titanium design with a larger 6.3-inch Super Retina XDR display.2 It’s remarkably durable, with the latest-generation Ceramic Shield material that’s 2x tougher than any smartphone glass.

BUILT FOR APPLE INTELLIGENCE - Apple Intelligence is the personal intelligence system that helps you write, express yourself and get things done effortlessly. With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no-one else can access your data. Coming December 2024. 1
TAKE TOTAL CAMERA CONTROL - Camera Control gives you an easier way to quickly access camera tools, like zoom or depth of field, so you can take the perfect shot in record time.

MAGNIFICENT SHOTS - Take your videos to a whole new level with 4K 120 fps Dolby Vision, enabled by the 48MP Fusion camera. The improved 48MP Ultra Wide camera lets you capture mesmerising detail in macro photos and wide-angle shots.

PHOTOGRAPHIC STYLES - The latest-generation Photographic Styles give you greater creative flexibility, so you can make every photo even more you. And thanks to advances in the image pipeline, you can now reverse any style, at any time.

THE POWER OF A18 PRO - A18 Pro chip enables Apple Intelligence with a faster Neural Engine, improved CPU and GPU, and a big jump in memory bandwidth. It also drives advanced video and photo features and powers AAA gaming.

A HUGE LEAP IN BATTERY LIFE - iPhone 16 Pro delivers an incredibly power-efficient performance with up to 27 hours video playback. 3 Charge via USB-C or snap on a MagSafe charger for faster wireless charging. 4

CUSTOMISE YOUR IPHONE - With iOS 18 you can tint your Home Screen icons with any colour. Find your favourite shots faster in the redesigned Photos app. And add playful, animated effects to any word, phrase or emoji in iMessage. 5

VITAL SAFETY FEATURES - If you need emergency services and you don’t have mobile service or Wi-Fi, you can use Emergency SOS via satellite. 6 With Crash Detection, iPhone can detect a severe car crash and call for help if you can’t. 7

description.main_description: With its cutting-edge chipset, clear display, and exceptional camera setup, the HMD Pulse Pro is a practical smartphone of choice for the modern trendsetter.
key_features:
HMD, Short For Human Mobile Devices - 

We’re all about making phones that are affordable, beautiful, desirable, and repairable. Or, to keep it simple, they help you get what you need without breaking the bank. That means creating devices that help tackle human tech challenges like e-waste and digital fatigue and make your life that little bit better.

Make Each Life's Moment A Masterpiece.. - 

with the powerful 50MP selfie camera and the help of some of our smartest AI. All-new Selfie gestures elevate the experience and relegate the need for a selfie stick. Eye-catching design that will leave you breathless. Remember to breathe, as HMD gen1 repairability will keep your phone running for years. Great balance of performance and power that lasts for up to three days. And with the 800 cycles of charging, you are set for 4+ years.

Lights, Camera, Action… - 

HMD Pulse Pro has a whopping 50 MP selfie camera with AI HDR that includes skin tone optimization, flash shots, Night Mode 2.0 and video EIS just to name a few.

Repair It Yourself… -

Your Selfie Game Is About To Level-Up… - 

HMD Pulse Pro has a mighty 50MP selfie camera with ingenious AI technology including selfie gestures and Night Selfie tech great for low light conditions.

Roll Out The Red Carpet… - 

HMD Pulse Pro isn’t just eye catching, it’s a head turner, a showstopper. It has a premium glass back plate that show off major celebrity vibes.

description.main_description: Introducing the Nokia 2660 Flip Phone – a device that harkens back to the essentials of communication. This compact companion excels at making calls, sending texts, and capturing pictures, offering simplicity in a world often dominated by distractions. With a built-in torch and FM radio, it's designed for those who appreciate the beauty of minimalism.
key_features:
Ease of Use - 

Ease of use is paramount with the Nokia 2660 Flip Phone. Its large buttons and generous screen make texting and calling a breeze, ensuring a user-friendly experience for all. Whether you're tuning into sports, music, or broadcasts, the integrated FM radio, with or without a headset, provides versatile entertainment.

Automated Efficiency - 

The device boasts hearing aid compatibility, combined with loud sound settings, ensuring excellent call quality for everyone. With a battery that lasts for days and a dedicated button for reaching emergency contacts, the Nokia 2660 Flip Phone prioritises staying connected while offering a respite from the constant digital noise.

specifications.Additional Features: FM Radio, Hearing Aid Compatible, Large Buttons

With its durable construction, QuickFix repairability, extended battery life, and advanced features, it's a device that offers more than just a smartphone – it empowers you to do more and make a positive impact on the planet.

QuickFix has you Covered - 

Forget about lengthy repair times. Thanks to QuickFix repairability, you can easily replace damaged displays and worn-out batteries, ensuring that your smartphone is always in optimal condition. No more waiting, no more hassle. The Nokia G22 puts you back in control.

Do More -

Take advantage of the memory extension tool, which turns unused storage space into virtual RAM. Impressive Battery Life - 

With an impressive battery life that lasts up to three days, the Nokia G22 gives you the freedom to use your phone without constantly worrying about running out of power. Plus, it's capable of 800 full charging cycles, ensuring long-lasting performance.

description.main_description: Meet Pixel 7a. It's engineered by Google, with the Google Tensor G2 chip, the amazing Pixel Camera and the highest rated smartphone for security by a third-party global research firm.1All at a great price.
key_features: The brains behind Pixel 7a - Engineered by Google, the Tensor G2 chip helps make Pixel 7a faster, more efficient and more secure than the Pixel 6a.2It's the same chip that's in Pixel 7 and Pixel 7 Pro, powering Google smarts for improved audio on phone calls, great battery life and amazing photo and video quality3.
The battery lasts all day - Pixel 7a’s Adaptive Battery can last over 24 hours.1Turn on Extreme Battery Saver, and it can last up to 72 hours.4And your Pixel can charge super fast5.

Great photography made simple - With a dual rear camera system and Google Tensor G2's advanced image processing, Pixel 7a lets you create perfect photos every time. It's easy to take amazing pictures in low light, or fix your blurry photos and remove distractions with a few taps in Google Photos6.
Extra protection when you're online - With VPN by Google One at no extra cost, Pixel helps protect your online activity no matter what app or web browser you use7.

Disclaimers: - 1Based on third-party global research firm. Evaluation considered features that may not be available in all countries. See goo.gle/mobilesecurity2022 for more information.
2Compared to Pixel 6a. Speed claim based on internal testing on pre-production devices. 
3Compared to Pixel 6a. Improvements may not work on all VOIP calls. Call quality depends on the environment, carrier network conditions and many other factors. Actual results may vary.
4For 'over 24 hours': Estimated battery life based on testing using a median Pixel user battery usage profile across a mix of talk, data, standby and use of other features. Average battery life during testing was approximately 31 hours. Battery testing conducted on a major operator network. For 'up to 72 hours': Estimated battery life based on testing using a median Pixel user battery usage profile across a mix of talk, data, standby and use of limited other features that are default in Extreme Battery Saver mode (which disables various features including 5G connectivity). Battery testing conducted on a major operator network. For both claims: Battery testing conducted in California in late 2022 on pre-production hardware and software using default settings, except that, for the 'up to 72 hours' claim only, Extreme Battery Saver mode was enabled. Battery life depends upon many factors and usage of certain features will decrease battery life. Actual battery life may be lower.
5Up to 18 watts. Fast wired charging rate is based upon use of the Google 30 W USB-C® Charger plugged into a wall outlet. Actual results may be slower. Adapters sold separately.
6Requires Google Photos app. May not work on all image elements.
7Restrictions apply. Some data is not transmitted through VPN. Not available in all countries. All other Google One membership benefits sold separately. This VPN offer does not impact the price or benefits of Google One plans. Use of VPN may increase data costs. See g.co/pixel/vpn for details.

description.main_description: Everything you love. Including the priceiPhone 16e is built for Apple Intelligence and powered by the A18 chip.1Shoot super-high-resolution photos with the 48MP Fusion camera. And with supersized battery life, you have more time to text, browse and more.

A18 CHIP. FAST INTO THE FUTURE - A18 chip powers Apple Intelligence, gaming, and regular iOS updates to keep your iPhone feeling new for years to come.

CAMERAS - The two-in-one camera system has a 48MP Fusion camera for super-high-resolution photos and an optical-quality 2x Telephoto. Take incredible selfies with the 12MP front camera.
DURABLE DESIGN. BRILLIANT DISPLAY - Stunning 6.1-inch display uses OLED technology. Ceramic Shield front — tougher than any smartphone glass.
ACTION BUTTON  - Quick customisable access to your favourite apps and features, or use visual intelligence to learn about your surroundings.

With a powerful 5010mAh battery, the TCL 605 is built to last through your busiest days. Whether you're on calls, streaming, or working on the go, you’ll enjoy long-lasting battery life with fast charging support to get you back up quickly.

description.main_description: Introducing the new Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, your Ultra intelligent everyday assistant.
key_features: Galaxy AI - Enjoy getting more things done, the simpler way with Galaxy AI1on the Galaxy S25 Ultra. Find a great pet-friendly restaurant nearby and message your friend to arrange a meeting time in a single step. Just ask in the natural way you would ask a person and it will process your request, performing complex tasks across multiple apps. Be ready for the day ahead from the moment you wake up, with Now Brief. Delivering your personalised insights, from weather, news, health stats, to calendar reminders and more. It’s your ultimate personal assistant.

Camera - Experience a new way to create with the Galaxy S25 Ultra. Shooting like a pro is simple, from capturing stunning landscapes, to super close-ups, the all new 50MP Ultrawide lens captures amazing photos whether they are ultra wide or super close. Galaxy S25 Ultra is powered by the next-gen Pro Visual Engine to give you Ultra detail at every setting. Upgraded Nightography features 2-steps of noise reduction so you can shoot videos as clear as day, even when the sun goes down.

Security \u0026amp; Privacy - Stay in control of your privacy on the Galaxy S25 Ultra. You have the freedom of personalising your security settings and opting in-or-out of Galaxy AI features1, for some added peace of mind. Knox Vault encryption ensures Galaxy AI on-device personalised data is secure and protected, so no other apps can access it.

Design - Sleek, premium and light, with new curved edges for your Ultra comfort. The Galaxy S25 Ultra is the ultimate in quality and elegant design, with a strong and light titanium frame2, an IP684rating for water and dust resistance, and Corning Gorilla Armour3. With a range of stylish colours to suit your aesthetic.

Performance - Enjoy performance that powers good times. The Galaxy S25 Ultra features an enhanced5built-in vapour chamber and the latest chipset, customised for Galaxy. It gives you faster speeds and extra power efficiency5for seamless gaming and epic entertainment on-the-go, all powered by a self-optimising and long lasting battery that you can rely on.

Display - Experience entertainment so immersive you might miss your stop, on the Galaxy S25 Ultra. Stream, game, video-call and multi-task on its expansive 6.9” screen, Ultra’s biggest one yet. With superior brightness and advanced ray tracing for unbelievable graphic detail, and a Galaxy AI-powered scaler1, so you can dominate every game.

key_features:
See More - 

With a large and intelligent external display1, the motorola razr 50 ultra 5G lets you access apps and moto ai-powered functions even without flipping open the phone.

Stylish and Comfortable - 

Compact and comfortable, the motorola razr 50 ultra features an iconic flip design. It comes in different colours and is crafted in soft vegan leather, making it a stylish choice for refined individuals.

Powered by moto ai - 

With Flex View, you can use the motorola razr 50 ultra like a camcorder and capture hands-free selfies. Thanks to the moto ai-powered camera system with a 50MP camera and 2x telephoto lens, you can effortlessly snap photos and videos.

Optimised Power and Performance - 

Equipped with a Snapdragon&reg; 8s Gen 3 with powerful AI engine processing, the motorola razr 50 ultra delivers optimum speed and efficiency. Powered by a 4000mAh battery, you get all-day power in up to 12 minutes using 45W TurboPowerTM charging2.

description.main_description: \u0026lt;h6\u0026gt; iPhone 15. Newphoria.\u0026lt;/h6\u0026gt;\r\n\u0026lt;p\u0026gt;iPhone 15 brings you Dynamic Island, a 48MP Main camera and USB-C — all in a durable colour-infused glass and aluminium design.\u0026lt;/p\u0026gt;
key_features: DYNAMIC ISLAND COMES TO IPHONE 15 — Dynamic Island bubbles up alerts and Live Activities — so you don’t miss them while you’re doing something else. You can see who’s calling, track your next ride, check your flight status and so much more.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN — iPhone 15 features a durable colour-infused glass and aluminium design. It’s splash-, water- and dust-resistant.1 The Ceramic Shield front is tougher than any smartphone glass. And the 6.1″ Super Retina XDR display2 is up to 2x brighter in the sun compared to iPhone 14

48MP MAIN CAMERA WITH 2X TELEPHOTO — The 48MP Main camera shoots in super-high resolution. So it’s easier than ever to take stand-out photos with amazing detail. The 2x optical-quality Telephoto lets you frame the perfect close-up.
NEXT-GENERATION PORTRAITS — Capture portraits with dramatically more detail and colour. Just tap to shift the focus between subjects — even after you take the shot.

POWERHOUSE A16 BIONIC CHIP — The superfast chip powers advanced features like computational photography, fluid Dynamic Island transitions and Voice Isolation for phone calls. And A16 Bionic is incredibly efficient to help deliver great all-day battery life. 3
USB-C CONNECTIVITY — The USB-C connector lets you charge your Mac or iPad with the same cable you use to charge iPhone 15 Plus. You can even use iPhone 15 Plus to charge Apple Watch or AirPods.

VITAL SAFETY FEATURES — If you need emergency services and you don’t have mobile network connection or Wi-Fi, you can use Emergency SOS via satellite. 4 With Crash Detection, iPhone can detect a severe car crash and call for help if you can’t.5

DESIGNED TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE — iPhone comes with privacy protections that help keep you in control of your data. It’s made from more recycled materials to minimise environmental impact. And it has built-in features that make iPhone more accessible to all.

original_name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 1TB - Blue Shadow

description.main_description: Unfold bigger moments with the all-new Galaxy Z Fold7. Now, the lightest and thinnest fold ever, without compromising on durability. It features stronger Gorilla Glass Ceramic 21on the cover screen, an Advanced Armour Aluminium frame1and hinge housing, so it’s built ready for life’s little accidents. Create wow-worthy photo and video content with the upgraded 200MP main sensor, a larger Ultra-wide camera that now supports auto-focus for macro photography, and increased 10MP sensor on both the main screen and cover, all supported with an improved Pro-Visual engine for stunningly vibrant visuals, day or night. Boost your productivity and creativity with the intuitive Gemini Live2AI assistant, that supports natural conversational voice prompts and multi-modal processing. Enjoy the all-day power of the self-optimising battery whilst you immerse yourself in a truly expansive viewing experience on its wider cover screen and larger main display1for the ultimate multitasking and entertainment experience.
key_features: Design - \nPacked with premium features without weighing you down, the new Galaxy Z Fold7 is the thinnest and lightest Fold ever. With a more durable Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2 cover screen and Advanced Armour Aluminium on the frame and the hinge housing for extra strength.\n

Camera - \nShoot like a pro with major camera upgrades on the new Galaxy Z Fold7. Featuring a high-resolution 200MP main sensor, a 10MP sensor on both the main and cover screen, a larger Ultra-Wide camera, plus upgraded visual processing for stunning detail, even in low light.3\n

Galaxy AI - 

Power more effortless productivity and creativity with Gemini Live2on the new Galaxy Z Fold7. With the ability to respond to conversational voice prompts and multi-modal processing, getting assistance from your ultimate AI companion has never been easier.

Performance / Battery - \nWhether it’s a busy day at work or entertaining yourself on a big road trip, get more out of every day with the long-lasting performance of a powerful self-optimising battery on the Galaxy Z Fold7.\n

Display - \nExperience the bigger picture with the new Galaxy Z Fold7. Now with a wider cover screen and even larger main screen3for immersive tablet-sized entertainment and dual-screen multitasking.\n

description.main_description: Get the best of pocket-sized power that’s also easy on your pocket with the new Galaxy Z Flip7 FE. It’s your new selfie game-changer with our all-time fave Flex Cam, featuring a 50MP wide lens and auto zoom for perfect framing, every time. Keep your cover screen fresh by creating customised wallpapers and enabling dynamic updates that display real-time events, like the weather1, on screen. Whether you’re working, creating or enjoying downtime, the powerful, self-optimising battery will sail you through the longest days. Get comfy and go hands free while you’re watching content, taking video calls or capturing selfies at every angle with the versatile Flex Mode2. Its sleek floating design is reinforced with Armour Aluminium and Gorilla Glass Victus3so it’s ready for life’s little accidents. Now is the time to make the Flip.
key_features: Flex Cam - \nBring your A-game to your selfies with Flex Cam on the new Galaxy Z Flip7 FE. With a bold 50MP wide camera and an auto zoom that recognises the subjects of the photo and adjusts them to fit, for the perfect shot.\n

Flex Window - \nMake your new Galaxy Z Flip7 FE even more you, with a dynamic outer cover screen display. Create premium wallpapers or enjoy automated display updates that respond to real world events, like the weather1
Battery - \nGet more out of the longest days with a powerful self-optimising 4,000mAh battery4
Flex Mode - \nFree up your hands for the fun stuff with Flex Mode2

Design - \nStep up your style with the sleek floating design on the new Galaxy Z Flip7 FE. It’s built to look good and be tough with a dual rail hinge to, durable armour aluminium and Gorilla Glass Victus.2

description.main_description: Keep your kids connected while keeping them safe online with the HMD Fuse 128GB. The HMD Fuse is built with HarmBlock+ protections and customisable features, so it adapts as your child’s needs change.
key_features:
HarmBlock+ - 

Featuring HarmBlock+, the HMD Fuse 128GB prevents explicit content from being shown, shot, or stored, giving parents peace of mind.

Parental Control - 

With parental control over apps and contacts, the HMD Fuse allows parents to decide when apps, web, and social access are enabled, with calls and texts limited to approved numbers.

Smart Safety Features - 

Track your child’s location in real time, receive safe zone alerts, and view where they’ve been for added security with the HMD Fuse.

Captures Motion - 

Made with a customisable design, the HMD Fuse can be personalised using smart cases that add selfie lighting, a gaming controller, or extra battery power.

description.main_description: Blending retro charm with modern practicality, the RUIO S1 4G Flip Phone offers clear calls, easy charging, and reliable durability. This flip phone is designed for those who want a simple, dependable phone that just works.
key_features:
Stay Connected with 4G Clarity - 

In the RUIO S1 4G Flip Phone, you can enjoy seamless connectivity with 4G LTE and VoLTE service for crystal-clear calls. Dual-SIM standby ensures you can manage personal and work numbers with ease.

Dual Screens for Everyday Convenience - 

The RUIO S1 Flip Phone features a large 2.8″ main QVGA display paired with a 1.77″ external colour screen, keeping you updated at a glance without needing to flip open the phone.

Built Tough, Made Simple - 

Designed with big physical buttons, a sturdy build, and a charging cradle included in the box, the RUIO S1 is easy to use, durable, and practical for everyday life.

Battery You Can Rely On - 

With a dedicated SOS speed dial button, instant help is always within reach. A long-lasting 1500mAh battery delivers up to 10 days standby and 7 hours talk time, so you stay connected with peace of mind.

original_name: RUIO Smart 64GB - Dark Blue + Wireless Earbuds

description.main_description: Stay connected and powered all day with the RUIO Smart 64GB. Packed with Android 14 Go, a 6.5-inch HD+ display, long-lasting 5000mAh battery, and dual SIM flexibility, it’s designed to handle your everyday needs with ease and style.
key_features:
Smooth Performance and Ample Storage - 

Powered by the SC9863 processor with Android 14 Go, the RUIO Smart 64GB delivers reliable performance for browsing, apps, and communication. With 64GB storage and 2GB RAM, you’ll have enough space for apps, photos, and everyday files.

Immersive HD+ Display - 

Enjoy videos, browsing, and social media on the RUIO Smart’s 6.517” HD+ IPS display (720 x 1600 pixels). Its crisp visuals make streaming, reading, and gaming a more engaging experience on the go.

Capture Life’s Moments - 

The RUIO Smart 64GB comes with an 8MP + VGA rear camera for everyday shots and a 5MP front camera for selfies and video calls, helping you stay connected and share memories effortlessly.

Long-Lasting Battery and Smart Connectivity - 

With a 5000mAh battery, the RUIO Smart is built to keep up with your day without frequent charging. Stay connected with VoLTE, GPS, Bluetooth, dual SIM support, and USB Type-C charging for seamless convenience.

description.main_description: Everything you love. Including the priceiPhone 16e is built for Apple Intelligence and powered by the A18 chip.1Shoot super-high-resolution photos with the 48MP Fusion camera. And with supersized battery life, you have more time to text, browse and more.
key_features: BUILT FOR APPLE INTELLIGENCE - Personal, private, powerful. Write, express yourself and get things done effortlessly1
A18 CHIP. FAST INTO THE FUTURE - A18 chip powers Apple Intelligence, gaming, and regular iOS updates to keep your iPhone feeling new for years to come.
SUPERSIZED BATTERY LIFE  - Text, browse, and binge movies and shows, with up to 26 hours of video playback2 — the best battery life in a 6.1-inch iPhone.3
CAMERAS - The two-in-one camera system has a 48MP Fusion camera for super-high-resolution photos and an optical-quality 2x Telephoto. Take incredible selfies with the 12MP front camera.
DURABLE DESIGN. BRILLIANT DISPLAY - Stunning 6.1-inch display uses OLED technology. Ceramic Shield front — tougher than any smartphone glass.
ACTION BUTTON  - Quick customisable access to your favourite apps and features, or use visual intelligence to learn about your surroundings.
MAKE IT YOURS - With iOS 18, you can customise your Home Screen and Lock Screen, send messages with text effects, Tapback with any emoji and more.

VISUAL SAFETY FEATURES - If you need emergency services and you don’t have mobile service or Wi-Fi, you can use Emergency SOS via satellite.4 With Crash Detection, iPhone can detect a severe car crash and call for help if you can’t.5
PRIVACY - Use Face ID to securely unlock, sign in and pay.
